tum.dss.thesis

Interface PrimalDecompositionInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PrimalDecompDeviation, PrimalDecomposition

    public interface PrimalDecompositionInterface
    Interface for the primal LP of the convex decomposition model, e.g. a Gurobi model.
    Author:
    Florian Stallmann

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createLP()
      Creates or update the LP model.
      double getExpectedSocialWelfare()
      Returns the calculated expected social welfare.
      double getObjective()
      Retrieves objective value of the LP.
      double[] getResult()
      Gets the result matrix as double array.
      List<Integer> getSolUsed()
      Get list of indices of all integer solutions where lambda > 0.
      void setIntegralityGap(double integrality_gap)
      Set the integrality gap of the oracle or any other value.
      void setMaxSocialWelfare(double welfare)
      Set the maximum social welfare of the LP relaxation.
      void solveLP()
      Solves the LP model.
      boolean testFeasibility()
      Test if LP model is already feasible.

    • Method Detail

      • createLP

        void createLP()
        Creates or update the LP model.

      • setIntegralityGap

        void setIntegralityGap(double integrality_gap)
        Set the integrality gap of the oracle or any other value.
        Parameters:
        integrality_gap - integrality gap of the separation oracle.

      • setMaxSocialWelfare

        void setMaxSocialWelfare(double welfare)
        Set the maximum social welfare of the LP relaxation. This is needed for validation or for calculating the deviation.
        Parameters:
        welfare - optimal social welfare.

      • solveLP

        void solveLP()
        Solves the LP model.

        If the model hasn't been created before this method should call createLP automatically.

      • testFeasibility

        boolean testFeasibility()
        Test if LP model is already feasible.

        The createLP needs to be called before to update the current model. Otherwise (without model) the method will always return false.

        Returns:
        true if feasible, otherwise false.

      • getResult

        double[] getResult()
        Gets the result matrix as double array.

        The solveLP method must be called before!

        Returns:
        convex decomposition solution.

      • getObjective

        double getObjective()
        Retrieves objective value of the LP.

        The solveLP method must be called before! This value should always be 1, otherwise something went wrong.

        Returns:
        objective value.

      • getExpectedSocialWelfare

        double getExpectedSocialWelfare()
        Returns the calculated expected social welfare.

        The solveLP method must be called before!

        The return value should be equal to the optimal social welfare divided by the integrality gap of the separation oracle. A validation of this is performed in the AbstractMechanism.step3SolvePrimal() method.

        Returns:
        social welfare.

      • getSolUsed

        List<Integer> getSolUsed()
        Get list of indices of all integer solutions where lambda > 0.

        The solveLP method must be called before!

        Returns:
        index of used solutions.
